sub_title: Managing Director and Co Founder at Miniature Project
summary:
I am Finance Professional with extensive, broad operational management experience and with deep knowledge of Business Administration and the necessary work experience with renowned and international companies.

I have advanced analytical and decision making skills, I can be described as a systematic, careful person with an eye for detail. 

I am accomplished team player, energetic, social, communicative and reliable, Innovative with the ability to deliver high quality work, I have highly developed sense of justice.

I am Proactive troubleshooter, identifying and resolving potential obstacles and complex (financial) issues before they are problems with my intelligence and analytical ability.

I have entered in my 22nd year of experience. I am currently working as Assistant Finance Manager  at Finance Department of eVision industry software.

Hereunder a brief introduction of my career in the past: 

•	I have gained international experience by working in the shared service centre of corporations like Sony Corporation, Rockwell Automation, Yamanouchi (Astellas) Pharmaceutical, BearingPoint (formerly KPMG Consulting), O3b Networks Ltd. (satellite industry) and Exact software.

•	I have worked for various entities located at The Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Hungary, France, Greece, Jersey Islands and United States.

profile_positions.description:
Lead role in International Treasury: Payment batches, Payments, Bank reconciliations, Forex trade. FX rates in system, funding, cash flow, Currency Revaluation
                                
Payroll: bookings, payments, reconciliation, variance analysis                        

Employee expenses:  Review & Approving cash and Credit card (Process owner of Credit card, External contact person) expense claims of staff worldwide.

Accounting: GL Bookings, Accruals, Various Ad hoc activities, Month end closing activities

Fixed assets reconciliation and depreciation 

Customer Project related hours capitalization

Customer chargeable hours, P&L and B&S related bookings.

Customer overdue balance chase and communication, feedback in system.     
     
Balance sheet, Trial balance review, yearly Audit support

Reporting: CBS reporting  and statistics

Dutch Work Related Expense Scheme (WKR) from the Dutch Tax Authorities
profile_positions.title: Assistant Finance manager

profile_positions.description:
SEPA/Treasury Projects for European entities. Key user for controls, payments & SDD.

Procure to Pay Process. Responsible for work Instructions for Exact Worldwide.

Declaration of Intra community performance for Europe (ICP) - Control and submission to Tax Authorities.

Fixed assets Accounting & reporting.  Feed for creations and controlling of depreciation run. FA register and ledger reconciliation.

Lead role for Accruals & Prepayments Accounting. General ledger and payroll bookings.

Lead role in preparing Resellers Commissions of various Maintenance products and working with Order administration department for smooth payments to dealers

Accounting for Deferred Revenue, Maintenance and  Cost of sales.

External Royalties, calculations, bookings & submission.

Inter-company Accounting and Recharges to other Exact entities

VAT reconciliation and VAT reports, Accounts payable, Accounts Receivable Ledger/Sub Ledger Reconciliation.

Variance analysis of P&L and Balance Sheet.

Ownership of all aspects of Financial Accounting for Exact Belgium, Month end closing. Preparation and submission of supplementary packs for reporting purpose.

Assisting Finance and administration manager for controlling supplementary packs for other European entities

Manage and creation of work instructions
profile_positions.title: Senior Finance & Administration Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Finance team active member in new Accounting system implementation (Microsoft Dynamics AX),    Ensured ledger integrity during data migration for multiple International entities.

Manager Accounts payable and payments, Coordinate smooth transfer of AP activities from  USA to The Netherlands

Establish practices for record keeping in the new corporate Head Office.

Finance Department Liaison with HR for all Payroll administration, Salary and Stipend payments.

Compile and Submit VAT reports to Tax authorities, coordinate Tax Accounting  with Director of Tax

Active member in GL Accounting, Implementing new entities in system
profile_positions.title: Senior Staff Accountant

profile_positions.description:
Bearingpoint (Former KPMG Consulting)

•	Ownership of all aspects of Financial Accounting for several BearingPoint companies, including BearingPoint Consulting, BearingPoint Holding. BearingPoint Finance and BearingPoint Partners BV.	
	 
•	Responsible for producing financial reports in Hyperion and SAP, including P&L, balance sheet, cash flow, ad hoc reports, and management reports. 

•	Managing Accounts Receivable and development of periodic cash flow forecasts , including review of bank movements.

•	Process owner for all Accounts Payable activities , including coding, bookings, payment approvals, vendor master data administration, and controlling.

•	Responsible for producing VAT reports and submission of VAT to tax authorities, and intercompany settlements and nettings.

•	Work closely with executive management to control employee travel expenses and manage end-to-end process from expense  submission to payment approvals to treasury.

•	Point of contact to fixed asset team and Auditors during audit cycles.
profile_positions.title: Senior Finance Accountant

profile_positions.description:
•	Process owner  for Intercompany Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable balance European and Global Netting, Netting reconciliation, Netting clearing, Recharge to Japan and other European affiliates

•	Point of contact for Foreign Customs monthly reports and VAT return for foreign affiliates like France, Denmark and  Portugal

•	Reliable contact for CBS  and De Nederlandse Bank various monthly reports

•	Process owner of various  GL data and financial data such as E-leave (accrual of  holiday balance from staff numbering to +/-650), Currency rate check up and Revaluation

•	Point of contact for month-end closing activities.
profile_positions.title: GL  Accountant

profile_positions.description:
•	Controlling, editing and posting of all system generated journals in error. Root cause analysis of errors in liaison with IT, processing of GL Journals.

•	Perform inter-company reconciliation for the Principal as well as all Commissionaires.

•	Reconciliation of the  third-party Accounts Payable Ledger for the Principal and the  Commissionaires.

•	Creating and responding  Notifications in Lotus data base.

•	Reconciliation of VAT accounts- Switzerland, Germany and Austria incoming and out going Accounts.

•	Fixed Asset reconciliation, creating acquisition forms and creation, fixing changes, checking of CIP account, running NBV table etc.

•	Currency clean up and Revaluation reports.

•	Point of contact for month-end closing activities.
profile_positions.title: Finance Accountant-GL

profile_positions.description:
•	Member of team overseeing all aspects of Financial Accounting for several Sony European subsidiaries.

•	Performed  Accounts Payable end-to-end processes, working with the iXOS workflow tool.

•	Process owner  for Intercompany Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable balance confirmation reports, communication, recharges intercompany clients and vendors

•	Responsible for Accounts Receivable sales invoices (Concerning dealers)

•	Responsible for preparation of bank reports and financial reports for both executive management and auditors.

•	Responsible for account reconciliations, including verification and controlling.	

•	Point of contact for duty and excise tax reconciliations and stock devaluations.

•	Responsible for Purchase Reconciliation, using the OPUS tool for obtaining logistics information. 

•	Accountable for entering exchange rates in SAP on daily basis for all European Sony entities.
profile_positions.title: General Ledger Officer - European shard service center

profile_positions.description:

•	Staff administration 
•	AP/AR activities, incoming payments
•	Arranging outgoing payments

•	Adviser to management
